name: The Last Transmission: Home (Ultimapwn)
description:
Help a lost astronaut find their way home. Fly though asteroid fields and celestial bodies and escape their gravity pull to discover coordinates to find a path back home. 

Controls: Left arrow / A = Turn ship counter - clockwise Right arrow / D = Turn ship clockwise Space = Afterburner

Developed during the Global Game Jam 2019. Won the Jammer's Choice award at the CIIT Philippines site.
